sourcesContent:
<template>
  <sidebar-layout-vue>
    <v-container class="fill-height flex-column">
        <v-card :width="width"
          :max-height="480"
          class="mx-auto"
          outilined
          elevation="3">
          <v-container>
            <!--CABEÇALHO-->
            <v-row dense>
              <v-col cols="12">
                <v-toolbar flat
                        rounded
                        dense
                        class="blue-grey lighten-4">
                  <v-toolbar-title class="font-weight-medium">
                    {{title}}
                  </v-toolbar-title> 

                  <!--slot CABEÇALHO-->
                  <slot name="header"></slot>

                </v-toolbar>
              </v-col>
            </v-row>
          
            
          </v-container>

          <!--CAMPOS-->
          <v-container dense>
            <slot name="body"></slot>
          </v-container>

          <!--RODAPE-->

          <v-container>
            <v-row dense
                  justify="end">
                  <slot name="footer"></slot>

                  <v-btn color="sucess"
                        small
                        elevation="5"
                        style="margin:0 15px"
                        @click="onSave"
                        >
                        <v-icon left>
                          mdi-checkbox-marked-circle
                        </v-icon>
                        Salvar
                  </v-btn>

                  <v-btn color="error"
                        small
                        elevation="5"
                        @click="onCancel"
                        >
                        <v-icon left>
                          mdi-close-circle
                        </v-icon>
                        Cancelar
                  </v-btn>
            </v-row>
          </v-container>

        </v-card>
    </v-container>
  </sidebar-layout-vue>
</template>

<script>
import SidebarLayoutVue from "@/layouts/SidebarLayout.vue";

export default {
  name:"FormList",
  components: {
    SidebarLayoutVue
  },
  props: {
      title: String,
      width: Number,
      maxH: Number,
  },
  data() {
    return {
    }
  },
  methods:{
    onSave(){
      console.log(this.routerInsert);
    },
    onCancel(){
      console.log(this.routerInsert);
    }
  }
}

</script>
